description.raw:
subt repository is a bit special containing different stuff and a catkin package. To release it, we are going to follow the same way we did for alias and use nightly release \(from source, no tarball\) supported by a [-release repo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/subt-release/). The build job needs to be called manually through jenkins and will build the latest code in default branch.

I’ve generated a [prerelease](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-debbuilder/3/)  and testing the job [running the lava\_tube launch file](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/subt-install_pkg-bionic-amd64/2/console).
